ygData.subject: Re: Lydl The Great quest item *minor spoiler*
ygData.msgSnippet: Try asking around the local mages guild.  If your popular enough, someone might want some help with a wayward apprentice. ... From: jcent@vanstar.com
ygData.messageBody:
Try asking around the local mages guild. If your popular enough, someone
might want some help with a wayward apprentice.

-----Original Message-----
From: jcent@... [mailto:jcent@...]
Sent: Monday, May 17, 1999 9:48 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Cc: rathe@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Lydl The Great quest item


From: jcent@...


I received a 'Locked Book' from the corpse of Lydl The Great, outside of
Freeport gate...right-clicking on it tells me it's a Lore Item.

Anyone know of the person who initiates this quest?

Thanks for any tips or spoilers. (I've run out of room in my bank vault to
store things, so I need to complete a few quests.

Fistlebane of Rathe server
